metadata.title: CVE-2022-30787 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An integer underflow in fuse_lib_readdir enables arbitrary memory readoperations in NTFS-3G through 2021.8.22 when using libfuse-lite.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-30787` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libntfs-3g88 - 1:2017.3.23-2ubuntu0.18.04.4
ntfs-3g - 1:2017.3.23-2ubuntu0.18.04.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntfs-3g package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2017.3.23-2ubuntu0.18.04.4').
